author: Gio_Vigilant
title: Weird Fun Set
review:
So, I'll start this off by saying, I'm a hardcore Little Robots fan, so getting some Lego releases of the characters was a must, Stretchy was top of my list. 

Mine was bought used so it was missing his junk collecting barrel/drum, but the figure alone is amazing. The articulation is fantastic, and just the overall design looks like he was ripped straight out of the show, genuinely such a great looking figure. 

Only problem with mine, it that is should have a "lights and sound" feature, although mine had light, sound function was broken, still though it's a great figure.
